message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal considering its quality and features.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for it, but I'm not sure I'm willing to go all the way up to $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than $90. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $105. How about we try $95? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go much higher.
